info.title: RedisManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure Redis Cache Service.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.Cache provider.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of operations.

post.description: Checks that the redis cache name is valid and is not already in use.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the CheckNameAvailability Redis operation. The only supported resource type is 'Microsoft.Cache/redis'

get.description: Gets all Redis caches in the specified subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

get.description: Lists all Redis caches in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

get.description: Gets all firewall rules in the specified redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: cacheName
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: cacheName
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: ruleName

parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: cacheName
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: ruleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update redis firewall rule operation.

delete.description: Deletes a single firewall rule in a specified redis cache.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: cacheName
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: ruleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

get.description: Gets all patch schedules in the specified redis cache (there is only one).

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: cacheName
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

200.description: Successfully got the current patch schedules

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: The redis cache was successfully found.

put.description: Create or replace (overwrite/recreate, with potential downtime) an existing Redis cache.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Redis operation.

200.description: The existing redis cache was successfully updated. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

201.description: The new redis cache was successfully created. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: The redis cache was successfully deleted.

202.description: The redis cache 'delete' operation was successfully enqueued; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: The redis cache was successfully deleted.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the Update Redis operation.

200.description: The existing redis cache was successfully updated. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

post.description: Export data from the redis cache to blobs in a container.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

202.description: Export operation successfully enqueued; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

post.description: Reboot specified Redis node(s). This operation requires write permission to the cache resource. There can be potential data loss.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Specifies which Redis node(s) to reboot.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

202.description: Import operation successfully enqueued; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

get.description: Gets the list of linked servers associated with this redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

get.description: Gets the detailed information about a linked server of a redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the redis cache.

parameters.name: linkedServerName
parameters.description: The name of the linked server.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

put.description: Adds a linked server to the Redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: linkedServerName
parameters.description: The name of the linked server that is being added to the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Linked server operation.

200.description: The linked server was successfully added.

201.description: The linked server was successfully added.

delete.description: Deletes the linked server from a redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the redis cache.

parameters.name: linkedServerName
parameters.description: The name of the linked server that is being added to the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

post.description: Retrieve a Redis cache's access keys. This operation requires write permission to the cache resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Lists the keys for the specified Redis cache.

get.description: Gets any upgrade notifications for a Redis cache.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: how many minutes in past to look for upgrade notifications

200.description: All upgrade notifications in given time range

get.description: Gets the patching schedule of a redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the redis cache.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default string modeled as parameter for auto generation to work correctly.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

put.description: Create or replace the patching schedule for Redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default string modeled as parameter for auto generation to work correctly.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters to set the patching schedule for Redis cache.

200.description: The patch schedule was successfully updated.

201.description: The patch schedule was successfully created.

delete.description: Deletes the patching schedule of a redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the redis cache.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default string modeled as parameter for auto generation to work correctly.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

post.description: Regenerate Redis cache's access keys. This operation requires write permission to the cache resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Lists the regenerated keys for Redis Cache

type.description: Resource type. The only legal value of this property for checking redis cache name availability is 'Microsoft.Cache/redis'.

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters body to pass for resource name availability check.

prefix.description: Prefix to use for exported files.

nextLink.description: Link for next set of notifications.

operation.description: Operation type: read, write, delete, listKeys/action, etc.

provider.description: Friendly name of the resource provider

resource.description: Resource type on which the operation is performed.

display.description: The object that describes the operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

primaryKey.description: The current primary key that clients can use to authenticate with Redis cache.

secondaryKey.description: The current secondary key that clients can use to authenticate with Redis cache.

enableNonSslPort.description: Specifies whether the non-ssl Redis server port (6379) is enabled.

minimumTlsVersion.description: Optional: requires clients to use a specified TLS version (or higher) to connect (e,g, '1.0', '1.1', '1.2')

redisConfiguration.description: All Redis Settings. Few possible keys: rdb-backup-enabled,rdb-storage-connection-string,rdb-backup-frequency,maxmemory-delta,maxmemory-policy,notify-keyspace-events,maxmemory-samples,slowlog-log-slower-than,slowlog-max-len,list-max-ziplist-entries,list-max-ziplist-value,hash-max-ziplist-entries,hash-max-ziplist-value,set-max-intset-entries,zset-max-ziplist-entries,zset-max-ziplist-value etc.

shardCount.description: The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.

RedisCommonProperties.description: Create/Update/Get common properties of the redis cache.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

RedisCreateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Redis operation.

staticIP.description: Static IP address. Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

subnetId.description: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in. Example format: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/Microsoft.{Network|ClassicNetwork}/VirtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1

RedisCreateProperties.description: Properties supplied to Create Redis operation.

RedisFirewallRule.description: A firewall rule on a redis cache has a name, and describes a contiguous range of IP addresses permitted to connect

RedisFirewallRuleCreateParameters.description: Parameters required for creating a firewall rule on redis cache.

nextLink.description: Link for next page of results.

value.description: Results of the list firewall rules operation.

RedisFirewallRuleListResult.description: The response of list firewall rules Redis operation.

endIP.description: highest IP address included in the range

startIP.description: lowest IP address included in the range

RedisFirewallRuleProperties.description: Specifies a range of IP addresses permitted to connect to the cache

RedisForceRebootResponse.description: Response to force reboot for Redis cache.

RedisLinkedServerCreateParameters.description: Parameter required for creating a linked server to redis cache.

linkedRedisCacheId.description: Fully qualified resourceId of the linked redis cache.

linkedRedisCacheLocation.description: Location of the linked redis cache.

RedisLinkedServerCreateProperties.description: Create properties for a linked server

provisioningState.description: Terminal state of the link between primary and secondary redis cache.

RedisLinkedServerProperties.description: Properties of a linked server to be returned in get/put response

RedisLinkedServerWithProperties.description: Response to put/get linked server (with properties) for Redis cache.

value.description: List of linked servers (with properties) of a Redis cache.

RedisLinkedServerWithPropertiesList.description: List of linked servers (with properties) of a Redis cache.

nextLink.description: Link for next page of results.

RedisListResult.description: The response of list Redis operation.

RedisPatchSchedule.description: Response to put/get patch schedules for Redis cache.

nextLink.description: Link for next page of results.

value.description: Results of the list patch schedules operation.

RedisPatchScheduleListResult.description: The response of list patch schedules Redis operation.

linkedServers.description: List of the linked servers associated with the cache

rebootType.description: Which Redis node(s) to reboot. Depending on this value data loss is possible.

shardId.description: If clustering is enabled, the ID of the shard to be rebooted.

RedisRebootParameters.description: Specifies which Redis node(s) to reboot.

keyType.description: The Redis access key to regenerate.

RedisRegenerateKeyParameters.description: Specifies which Redis access keys to reset.

zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

RedisResource.description: A single Redis item in List or Get Operation.

RedisUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update Redis operation.

RedisUpdateProperties.description: Patchable properties of the redis cache.

scheduleEntries.description: List of patch schedules for a Redis cache.

ScheduleEntries.description: List of patch schedules for a Redis cache.

dayOfWeek.description: Day of the week when a cache can be patched.

maintenanceWindow.description: ISO8601 timespan specifying how much time cache patching can take.

startHourUtc.description: Start hour after which cache patching can start.

ScheduleEntry.description: Patch schedule entry for a Premium Redis Cache.

capacity.description: The size of the Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: for C (Basic/Standard) family (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), for P (Premium) family (1, 2, 3, 4).

family.description: The SKU family to use. Valid values: (C, P). (C = Basic/Standard, P = Premium).

name.description: The type of Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: (Basic, Standard, Premium)

Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create Redis operation.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
